page.title: 02TRANSPORT IN HOUNSLOW
page.content: {Train Services.}Piccadilly line - underground electric, Heathrow to Cockfosters. 3 minute service.Southern Region- surface railway electric, Isleworth to Waterloo-30 mins.service frequent buses in the area on 13 local bus routes and 1 long distance route. They are double or single decker with automatic doors.Some have driver only, some have conductor too.They are diesel driven,red in colour and carry about 60 passengers standing or sitting.There are{2 main tarmac roads, the A4 and A315 with pavements,traffic lights,pedestrian crossings,subway. {Speed limits are 40 and 30m.p.h.} Roads run westwards from london.2800 vehicles per hour use the A4. Cars, lorries.motorbikes and buses. All vehicles are petrol or diesel driven. There is a large private commercial haulage firm and many mini-cab firms.
